words.source: H1961: KJV 'And', ESV 'The sons', NASB 'The sons' (waw-consecutive + verb 'to be'; translations vary on rendering as 'And the sons' or separate conjunction)
H1121: KJV 'sons', ESV 'sons', NASB 'sons' (consistent across versions as 'sons')
H8061: KJV 'Shemida', ESV 'Shemida', NASB 'Shemida' (proper name, identical rendering)
H291: KJV 'Ahian', ESV 'Ahian', NASB 'Ahian' (proper name, identical rendering)
H7928: KJV 'Shechem', ESV 'Shechem', NASB 'Shechem' (proper name; conjunction often integrated)
H3949: KJV 'Likhi', ESV 'Likhi', NASB 'Likhi' (proper name, identical rendering)
H593: KJV 'Aniam', ESV 'Aniam', NASB 'Aniam' (proper name, identical rendering)
